```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(ggpubr))
```

```{r}
z <- read.delim("target_backgound_stability.tsv", header = T)
```

### Distribution of Stability Scores

The distributions of the best stability scores computed for each ssRNA::promoter in the background promoters sample and in target promoters sample are represented and compared with a Mann-Whitney test.

```{r fig.height=4, fig.width=4, fig.align="center"}
ggplot(z, aes(x = Class, y = Stability_best, fill = Class)) +
  geom_boxplot(width = .6, outlier.shape = NA) +
  stat_compare_means(method.args = list(alternative = "less")) +
  geom_jitter(width = .1, height = NULL, size =.8) +
  theme_pubr(legend = "none") + scale_fill_manual(values = c("gray", "gold")) +
  xlab("")
```
